dct_title_s: Ice Age Trail Connecting Routes Wisconsin 2019
dct_description_sm: This line data layer represents the connecting routes of the Ice Age Trail for Wisconsin in 2019. The dataset was originally published by the Ice Age Trail Alliance on May 14, 2012 and later updated on September 25, 2019.[This vector line dataset represents the Ice Age National Scenic Trail and select other trails in the vicinity of the Ice Age Trail in Wisconsin.]
schema_provider_s: American Geographical Society Library â€“ UWM Libraries
